content.rendered:
Route 4’s Raid Den is found west of the Grim Woods entrance, located between two trees before reaching the Cinder Volcano entrance. You’ll need to cut down a small tree to reach the Raid Den’s location.

Location

Raid Pokémon

Pokémon Star Level
